descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Ja Morant quickly makes his presence felt in his return to the court, sending a sweet pass to Steven Adams for the hoop and the harm.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Morant's wraparound dime sets up Adams for and-1) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morant's wraparound dime sets up Adams for and-1

videos.description: Ja Morant sends a pinpoint bounce pass to Xavier Tillman Sr. for the slam and then lets the Thunder know about it.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play ('I'm back!' Ja announces his return with sensational bounce pass) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: 'I'm back!' Ja announces his return with sensational bounce pass

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander air-balls a floater, but gets the ball back and hits a desperation shot as the buzzer sounds.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA scores wild basket to beat the shot clock) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA scores wild basket to beat the shot clock

videos.description: Ja Morant is all alone in transition and shows out with a reverse slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Morant throws down reverse jam) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Morant throws down reverse jam

videos.description: Thunder rookie Josh Giddey patiently spins around a defender and gets his lefty hook to drop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giddey goes into his bag for tough score in traffic) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giddey goes into his bag for tough score in traffic

videos.description: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Josh Giddey assist each other on two crucial Thunder baskets in the final minute vs. the Grizzlies.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (SGA, Giddey come up clutch for OKC in crunch time) 2021/12/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: SGA, Giddey come up clutch for OKC in crunch time
